intro.line2: Spoteditor is for those wondering, "Where should we go out?"

desc: Deciding where to go out can be surprisingly stressful, right? You have to find restaurants, photo spots, plan your route... ugh, it's a headache!
With Spoteditor, you don‚Äôt have to worry about any of that. We help you find a great date course or a chill route to explore with friends.
Just tell us the kind of vibe you want, who you're going with, and where you want to hang out. We‚Äôll suggest the perfect route for your day!
categories: A fun and fulfilling day with friends

editor.typingText: Every user can become a special "Editor"!
desc: Share your favorite hidden gems and food spots. Imagine someone having a wonderful day based on the route you created ‚Äî feels amazing, right? ü•∞
Help others by sharing your personal routes and recommendations.
Your course might be the inspiration someone else was looking for!
